body:
Why isn't a `static_cast<int>` sufficient here? The signature of the macroed function is:

```
__global__ void NAME(curandStateMtgp32 *state, int size, T *result, ARG1, ARG2)      \
```

Certainly on many platforms `int` is 32-bit, but I wouldn't rely on that.
